title: Cold fish
description: It’s a streamlined and accessible drafting game to collect sets, I’m just not sure I find drafting games all that interesting personally.  Doesn’t feel very compelling turn to turn, or counting up arbitrary points at the end.  But if you want a cute, quick card drafting game that is the essence of card drafting, this is it.  And then go get sushi.

title: Great gate...
description: Great gateway game. Fun, quick, easily digestible. Highly recommended for newer gamers.
